title: Can you change the initial call screen greeting?
content: When someone calls you and the call screen option is activated the caller is greeted with a "the person you have called is ....."  The problem I am seeing is the caller hears the first couple words.. ASSUMES "the person you are calling is not available" and hangs up.  Is there a way to change the initial greeting?  has anyone else noticed this?  I know it's hard to notice since a spammer would also just hang up.
